newsitem.headline: NOTICE OF SALE - Haddon Heights, N.J.

text.p: The Board of Education of the Borough of Haddon Heights
SEALED PROPOSALS will be received by the undersigned fo The Board of Education of the Borough of Haddon Heights, in the County of Camden, New Jersey (
the School District's Administrative Offices, 300 Second Avenue, Haddon Heights, New Jersey 08035 until 11:00 A.M., on
at which time they will be publicly opened and announced for the purchase of the referenced bonds, due on May 1
Year Amount Year Amount Year Amount

The Bonds will be dated May 1, 1997 and bear interest at the rate per annum specified by the successful bidder therefor, payable on November 1, 1997 and semiannually thereafter on May 1 and November 1 in each year until maturity or earlier redemption. The Bonds will be subject to redemption prior to maturity on the terms and conditions set forth in the Preliminary Official Statement hereinafter mentioned. Upon initial issuance, the Bonds will be issued in book- entry-only form and registered in the name of Cede & Co., as nominee of The Depository Trust Company, New York, New York (DTC''). Individual purchases may be made in the principal amount of $5,000 or any integral multiple thereof through book entries made on the books and records of DTC and its participants. The Bonds will be issued subject to the approving legal opinion of Parker, McCay & Criscuolo, Marlton, New Jersey, Bond Counsel to the School District. Copies of the full Notice of Sale and Official Form of Proposal and Preliminary Official Statement may be obtained by contacting Mark J. Stratton, Business Administrator/Board Secretary, at the School District's Administrative Offices, 300 Second Avenue, Haddon Heights, New Jersey 08035. The School District's telephone number is (609) 547-1412.
